sentences.english: The Charter scheme is expected to help enhance vehicle safety and improving roadside air quality.
sentences.chinese: 預期約章計劃有助提高車輛安全和改善路邊空氣質素。

sentences.english: Hong Kong was suffering from a shortage of high-quality Putonghua teachers.
sentences.chinese: 香港缺乏高質素的普通話教師。

sentences.english: And the Shuangjiang on banks asset quality is also a major positive.
sentences.chinese: 而對銀行的資產質素霜降也是一個重要的積極的。

sentences.english: Lignin staining showed an increase in lignification in culms of the overexpressor lines.
sentences.chinese: 木質素着色表明過表達株系莖部木質化增加。

sentences.english: I agree the service quality of CotaiJet is extremely high.
sentences.chinese: 我認同金光飛航有極高質素的服務。

sentences.english: This paper deals with the application of Lignin in oil dilling and recovery technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文系統地綜述了木質素在石油鑽採工藝中的應用。

sentences.english: Alkylation of wheat straw alkaline lignin was conducted by reacting lignin with different alkyl halides .
sentences.chinese: 用不同的滷代烷烴與鹼木質素進行烷基化反應。

sentences.english: Historically, a Carthaginian citizen phalanx was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 在歷史上，迦太基公民方陣是低質素的。

sentences.english: Robert Parker says this wine is comparable with a Grand Cru Classe.
sentences.chinese: 酒評人派克指，此酒的質素可媲美特級酒。

sentences.english: The inexpensive and convenient coal water mixture(CWM) additive is prepared by sulfonation modify with sulfate lignin.
sentences.chinese: 利用硫酸鹽木質素改性製備廉價易得的水煤漿添加劑。

sentences.english: The wood sugars are removed and the lignosulfonate is used as a clay deflocculant.
sentences.chinese: 去掉木糖，木質素磺酸鹽可用作粘土解絮凝劑。

sentences.english: In the kraft paper process, lignin is solubilized by caustic soda.
sentences.chinese: 在硫酸鹽槳造紙過程中，木質素被苛性鈉溶解。

sentences.english: The structure unit of lignin is guaiacol.
sentences.chinese: 木質素的結構單元是愈創木基。

sentences.english: Café Xina is your best choice for high quality food.
sentences.chinese: 老外咖啡是您品嚐高質素美食的最佳選擇。

sentences.english: On one hand, the higher quality of output by A can reflect the lower quality of output by B. (3)
sentences.chinese: 在一方面，甲的質素較高可以反映乙的質素較低。

definition: character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
whole entity/entire body/synthesis/as a whole (situation, construction, team etc)/global/macrocosm/integral/holistic/whole
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
